Michael, on the other hand, is probably more directly affected by his child's needs, meaning he's likely missing work more frequently. This could be a bigger impact on his job performance since he's not only handling his own responsibilities but also spending time with someone who might need more attention than usual.

So putting it all together, Mary seems to be managing her workload better despite missing some work, while Michael is more directly affected by family obligations, leading to him suffering more from missing work.
</think>
